segments.text: Hi , Mary , it ’ s been a long time
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , my old friend . Long time no see . How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m doing okay . And how about yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not so well . To be honest with you , I broke up with Tom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I ’ m sorry to hear that . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1
